title: Logan Square ( armitage / kimball) 3 Bedroom 1 Bath
posting_body: ['Available for Lease July 1, 2022 is this 3 bedroom, 1 bath or 2 bedroom with office/extra room, raised 1st floor unit in Logan Square near Armitage and Kimball.', 'Gut rehabbed in the recent years, this unit has a wide open living room, high 10-foot ceilings with recessed lighting, hardwood throughout, central heat and air-conditioning, freshly painted, brand new kitchen with granite and stainless appliances,  and yes a dishwasher!', 'and a small outdoor porch - gated property with only 3 units.', 'This is a hot area with new construction and rehab all around.', 'This unit is 1/2 block from the 606 Bloomingdale Trail!...', 'Tenant pays gas and electric.', 'Pets may be allowed.', 'Laundry machines in basement.', 'Credit check and move-in fee required.', 'Please reply by email with questions or to make an appointment.']
